Import libraries
```{r}
library(DBI) #not postgres specific
library(RPostgres) #gives us the postgres driver 
library(tidyverse) 
```

Create connection
```{r}
con <- dbConnect(Postgres(),                 # Use the postgres driver
                 dbname = 'metalworkingsolutions',     # Name of the database we want to connect to
                 host = 'localhost',         # 'localhost' or eg. 'ec2-54-83-201-96.compute-1.amazonaws.com'
                 port = 5432, 
                 user = 'postgres',
                 password = rstudioapi::askForPassword("Database password"))
```

list tables in database
```{r}
dbListTables(con)
```

```{r}
dbListFields(con, 'jobs')
```

```{r}
query = "SELECT * FROM jobs LIMIT 100;"

res <- dbSendQuery(con, query)
```


```{r}
jobs <- dbFetch(res)
dbClearResult(res)
```



```{r}
jobs
```
